title: Senior Solution Architect
description:
- Devoteam, the #1 EMEA ServiceNow partner, empowers organisations to achieve breakthrough results with the Now Platform. With over 850 expert consultants across 18 countries, we drive business transformation by harnessing the power of ServiceNow's AI platform. Since 2009, we've delivered innovative digital workflows that optimise operational productivity, elevate employee experiences, and redefine customer engagement. Our holistic approach and deep expertise across the full ServiceNow platform ensure your success. As a ServiceNow Elite partner since 2019 and the proud recipient of the 2024 Partner of the Year award, Devoteam is your trusted guide to unlock the full potential of ServiceNow.

  
The Senior Solution Architect will be responsible for critical technical aspects of project and solution delivery, including:


* Provide expert consultation to clients on Service Strategy and Design, demonstrating the business value of Service Management solutions.
* Articulate and package our competencies within Service Strategy and Design services for both external clients and internal stakeholders.
* Contribute to the development of a premier Service Management practice and consultancy organization.
* Collaborate with sales to develop and execute a strategic go-to-market plan, leveraging our value-based competencies.
* Serve as an integral member of the implementation project team, addressing complex technical challenges across multiple projects simultaneously.
* Oversee the configuration and customization of SaaS solutions to meet client requirements.
* Produce high-quality, technically accurate client-facing and internal deliverables.
* Establish and maintain implementation best practices and service offerings based on project experiences and industry standards.
* Drive continuous improvement initiatives and provide strategic advice to enhance service delivery.
* Deliver comprehensive ITIL process knowledge and advisory services to clients.
* Assume the role of solution architect, taking full responsibility for the overall solution implementation.
* Provide expert business support advisory in alignment with Service Management best practices.
* Serve as the primary liaison between client demand organizations, analyzing and communicating the advantages and disadvantages of proposed solution architectures from both process and technical perspectives.
* Develop and articulate comprehensive solution architectures, addressing both process and technical aspects.
* Conduct thorough analyses of the business impact and value proposition of proposed solutions for clients.
* Lead and conduct both process-oriented and technical training sessions to ensure successful solution adoption.

  
* Proficiency in ITSM tools is highly desirable, though not mandatory.
* A minimum of 10 years of experience serving as a technical resource on delivery engagements in client environments is essential.
* Demonstrated expertise in Web Technologies, including but not limited to XML, HTML, JavaScript, and Web Services, is required.
* Comprehensive understanding of technical components such as LDAP, VPN, and SSL is crucial.
* Exceptional communication skills are paramount, including active listening, thoughtful decision-making, and superior verbal and written expression.
* A proven track record in consulting is necessary, encompassing a deep understanding of business drivers behind technology, problem-solving capabilities, meticulous attention to detail, resourcefulness, and the ability to ask pertinent questions.
* The ability to work effectively in a team environment is critical. Additionally, the willingness to travel, primarily within the Nordic region, is an important aspect of this role.
* ITIL Certification is a mandatory requirement for this position.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: IT-strateg
description:
**Att jobba som IT-strateg på Skandiabanken**
 Vi på Skandiabanken söker en IT-strateg som vill spela en nyckelroll i utvecklingen av vår digitala resa. Du får möjlighet att påverka bankens framtida utveckling genom att forma och driva vår IT-strategi i linje med affärsmål, regulatoriska krav och vår innovationsagenda. Hos oss kombinerar du strategiskt arbete med verkliga utvecklingsleveranser– i tätt samarbete med både affär och IT. Som IT-strateg ansvarar du för att säkerställa att Skandiabankens utveckling levererar affärsnytta, innovation och regelefterlevnad. Du leder utvecklingen av bankens IT-strategi i nära dialog med våra affärsområden samt säkra och följer upp att våra utvecklings- och förvaltningsportföljer är i takt med våra strategiska mål.
   

  

 Du Arbetar Nära CIO-funktionen, Affärsområden Och Koncernkollegor För Att Samordna Långsiktig Riktning Med Taktisk Förmåga. I Praktiken Innebär Det Att
   

  

* Driva och vidareutveckla bankens IT-strategi utifrån bankens övergripande mål
* Säkra och följa upp utvecklingsportföljen utifrån strategi och mål
* Säkerställa en effektiv och affärsdriven utvecklingsmetodik
* Bidra till transformation, modernisering och långsiktig teknisk riktning


 Du blir en del av CIO-funktionen som ansvarar för att Skandiabankens IT – som till stor del är outsourcad – utvecklas i linje med strategier och avtal. Här finns också vår arkitekturkompetens samt säkerhetsgrupp med ansvar för IT- och informationssäkerhet, dataskydd och kontinuitet.
   

  

**För att lyckas i rollen som IT-strateg**
 Du är en trygg strateg som är van att arbeta nära affärsutveckling med god förståelse för bankens verklighet – affärsmässigt, tekniskt och regulatoriskt. Du trivs i rollen som brygga mellan affär och IT.
   

  

**Avgörande**
* Relevant akademisk examen
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av IT-strategi, styrning eller portföljledning – gärna inom bank eller annan reglerad sektor
* God förståelse för finansiella verksamheter och regelverk
* Förmåga att kombinera affärsdriv, innovation och regelefterlevnad
* God kommunikativ förmåga, både muntligt och skriftligt
* Förmåga att se helheter och koppla teknik till affärsmål
* Senioritet och vana av att arbeta nära ledningsnivå
* Förmåga att utöva informellt och virtuellt ledarskap i komplexa miljöer
* God kännedom om både agila och traditionella projektmetoder
* Goda kunskaper i Microsoft Office-verktyg


**Meriterande**
* Certifiering inom agila ramverk
* Erfarenhet av transformationsprogram eller modernisering av legacy-miljöer
* Kännedom om finansiella regelverk som PSD2 och DORA
* Erfarenhet av AI, datadriven affärsutveckling eller plattformsstrategier i bankmiljö


 Hos oss får du en strategisk nyckelroll i en bank som tar digitalisering och långsiktig hållbarhet på allvar. Du får möjlighet att påverka, arbeta nära beslut – och bidra till verklig förändring.
   

  

**Vad händer nu?**
 Just nu är det semestertider, urval kommer påbörjas i slutet av v.32. I ansökan kommer vi att ställa ett antal urvalsfrågor som ligger till grund för första urvalet. För att göra rekryteringsprocessen så rättvis och objektiv som möjligt kommer det att ingå intervjuer, tester, bakgrundskontroll samt digital referenstagning.
   

  

 Om du har frågor kring rollen, vänligen kontakta rekryterande chef Emma Spjuth på emma.spjuth@skandia.se
   

  

 Om du har frågor kopplat till rekryteringsprocess, vänligen ta kontakt med Jenny Fröjd på jenny.frojd@skandia.se
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Mer om Banken**
 Vi har varit pionjärer inom digital bankverksamhet sedan starten 1994, som Sveriges första helt digitala bank. Med en passion för innovation och kundfokus har vi vuxit till att erbjuda ett brett utbud av produkter och tjänster inom områdena Låna, Spara och Betala – med särskilt fokus på bolån.
   

  

 Vår verksamhet är fördelad mellan Stockholm och Linköping. I Stockholm finns majoriteten av vår verksamhet, medan vår kundservice har sitt hjärta i Linköping. Tillsammans är vi cirka 270 medarbetare anställda på banken som varje dag skapar smarta lösningar för våra kunder.
   

  

**Vårt Erbjudande Inkluderar**
* Låna: Transparenta och attraktivt prissatta bolån
* Spara: Sparande i fonder och aktier samt på sparkonto
* Betala: Lönekonto samt smidiga kort- och betalningstjänster.


 Vi tror på att människor som utvecklas, presterar och mår bra är nyckeln till framgång. Hos oss är kompetensutveckling och lärande självklara delar av vardagen – framåt tillsammans!

title: IT Service Management Consultant
description:
Vi på B3 Business Transformation skapar framtidens kundmöte och vårt fokus är att få saker att hända på riktigt. Ofta handlar det om att stärka den digitala konkurrenskraften hos våra kunder genom att få till beslut och leda utveckling av nya digitala initiativ men även att förbättra den digital förmågan. Vi söker därför en IT Service Management konsult som vill vara med och utveckla våra kunders digitala tjänster till nya nivåer.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Som konsult hos oss ges du möjligheter till intressanta uppdrag hos en mängd olika spännande kunder. Att du har förmågan att skapa relationer och på ett prestigelöst sätt samarbeta i team tror vi är avgörande för att du ska lyckas i ditt uppdrag. I rollen som ITSM kommer du att leda arbetet med att hantera tjänster. Det kan handla om att driva uppföljning av tjänsteleveranser och dess SLAer och KPIer, rapportering och förändringsledning. Många gånger handlar uppdragen även om att utveckla tjänster och processer hos kunden.
   

  

**Vi ser att du har följande kvalifikationer:**
* Du har minst 5 års erfarenhet från att förvalta och förbättra IT-tjänster (applikationer och drift) i roller som t.ex. IT Service Manager, IT Service Delivery Manager, Processledare (ITIL), Tjänsteförvaltare, Projektledare, Förvaltningsledare.
* Har ansvarat för eller varit en delaktig i arbetet kring tjänsteutveckling.
* Ha god kunskap inom agila ramverk och ITIL.
* Är intresserad av AI och ser fördelen med detta för att förbättra tjänsteleveranser, processautomatisering eller analys av driftdata.
* Har god förmåga att arbeta strategiskt, taktiskt och operativt.
* Det är meriterade om du har arbetat som konsult


 B3 Business Transformation är en del av B3 Consulting Group, ett av Sveriges snabbast växande företag inom IT och management. Således kan vi erbjuda det bästa av två världar. Styrkan hos ett stort börsnoterat bolag i kombination med den härliga samhörigheten som ett mindre bolag erbjuder.

title: Product Specialist
description:
**Job Description:**
**Product Specialist**
**About Us**
 Easit AB is a Swedish software company with first-class consulting within system and business development. With in-house developed products for Enterprise Service Management and Data Management, we deliver powerful solutions to large companies and businesses for both the private and public sector. We’re situated in Sundsvall Stockholm, in Sweden, and have appr. 40 employees.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
 The product specialist creates, develops and implements work processes in our product Easit GO. The role can involve both permanent assignments with customers or shorter and parallel assignments in project form. The role works close to the customer, works proactively, and is a catalyst for ideas. The position is placed in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

**ROLE RESPONSIBILTILES**
**Key Responsibilities:**
* Develop and maintain long-term customer relationships
* Pay attention to customer needs and come up with solutions
* Configuration / adaptations in Easit GO
* Capture the customer's exact requirements in depth
* To run, facilitate and participate in workshops to find solution proposals for the customer
* Educate customers in the product Easit GO.


**Key Skills & Experience:**
* Proven previous experience as Product Specialist or similar
* Hold a degree or relevant qualification is desirable
* Excellent written and verbal communications skills, both in Swedish and in English
* Good understanding of technology and how it is applied in business
* A genuine IT interest
* Knowledge and experience within Microsoft programs, e.g.AD, Excel, Power BI and Azure
* Experience of working in processes
* ITIL certification is meritorious.


**Personal Attributes:**
* High degree of self-motivation
* Driven, High Energy and enthusiasm
* Honesty and integrity
* Strong customer service mindset
* Enjoys working in a team
* Be able to work independently.


**WHY JONAS SOFTWARE?**
* Be part of a dynamic and innovative global organisation.
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.
* Opportunities for career growth within our expansive portfolio.
* Join a collaborative environment that champions diversity, equity, and inclusion, creating a space where everyone can excel.


**What Our Employees Say About Us**
 See what our employees say about us in the highlights video from our Jonas Annual Business Awards 2023 https://www.jonassoftware.co.uk/insights and our ‘Every Person Matters’ video from our Jonas Annual Business Awards 2024 https://www.jonassoftware.co.uk/why-jonas/people-culture/
   

  

**Additional Information**
**LOCATION**
* Remote or Office/Hybrid (ability to travel, sometimes at short notice)
* The position is based in Solna, Sweden.


**Benefits**
* Private Health Insurance
* Health Benefit 5 000 SEK yearly
* Contribution to you home internet connection.
* Mobile phone with 15 GB internet connection and free calls.


**MUCH MORE THAN A BENEFIT**
* Internal Learning & Development programmes
* Internal Mentor programme
* Employee Assistance Program (EAP) and Mental Health First Aiders to support you
* Jonas Europe & Jonas Global networking events (JABAs, GROW, JSA). Join communities, build networks and collaborate with your colleagues across the Global Group.


**OUR DEIB COMMITMENT**
 Our people define us and, at Jonas, we believe that diversity in all its forms enriches our organisation and drives innovation. We actively seek to create an environment where all employees feel valued, heard, and empowered to contribute their best work. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected characteristic and are dedicated to providing equal opportunities for all. Come and be part of a team where your unique background and experiences are celebrated!
   

  

 We strongly encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds, including those from underrepresented groups such as women, ethnic minorities, people with disabilities, and LGBTQ+ individuals and we are committed to creating an interview and hiring process that is accessible and inclusive for everyone.
   

  

**FLEX WORKS CULTURE**
 Here at Jonas Software UK & Europe, we see flexibility as a game-changer. We truly believe that working flexibly together helps to increase our innovation, growth and productivity, as well as supports our employees’ wellbeing and helps to provide great places to work.
   

  

 For most roles, the following types of flexibility are usually possible: working location, number of hours/days worked, different start and finishing times, flexible lunch break arrangements, agreed core hours, flexible hours, an element of working from home.
   

  

 Many of our employees work flexibly in many different ways, including part-time. Please talk to us at interview about the flexibility you need. We can’t promise to give you exactly what you want, but we do promise not to judge you for asking.
   

  

**Business Unit:**
 Easit ESM
   

  

**Scheduled Weekly Hours:**
 40
   

  

**Number of Openings Available:**
 1
   

  

**Worker Type:**
 Regular
   

  

**Career Site:**
**More About Jonas Software:**
 Jonas Software is the leading provider of enterprise management software solutions to the Country and Golf Clubs, Foodservice, Construction, Fitness & Sports, Attractions, Salon & Spa, Education, Radiology/Laboratory Information Systems, and Product Licensing industries. Within these vertical markets, Jonas is made up of over 65 distinct brands, which are respected and leaders within their own domain.
   

  

 Jonas’ vision is to be the branded global leader across the aforementioned vertical markets and to be recognized by customers and respective industry stakeholders as the trusted provider of ‘Software for Life’ and as an ambassador for technology, product innovation, quality, and customer service.
   

  

 Jonas Software is the valued technology partner of over 60,000 customers worldwide in more than 30 countries. Jonas employs over 2,000 skilled individuals consisting of a cross-section of industry experts and technology professionals. Jonas is headquartered in Canada and also operates offices throughout North America, the United Kingdom, Europe, Australia New Zealand and Africa. Jonas is a 100% owned subsidiary of Constellation Software Inc., headquartered in Toronto and traded on the S&P/TSX 60.
   

  

**IS THIS YOU?**

title: Business Systems Analyst, Workforce Management
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 At Wolt, people are our most important asset. The People Technology Team helps to deliver and facilitate strategic technology projects within the People Team. This role will be focused on supporting our People Technology function as we continue to optimize the advancement of our organization. We’re looking for business system analysts to help us scale Wolt + DoorDash’s enormous growth. Come help shape a best in class People Technology team!
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a Business System Analyst with demonstrated HRIS experience to assist with strategic initiatives across our organization. Experience with
 **Workday HCM** 
 is preferable for this role. You will work cross-functionally to achieve business goals through system configuration, testing and documentation. As a Business System Analyst you will help deliver solutions to support business strategy, and assist in the implementation, maintenance and enhancement of people technology systems.
   

  

**Please note that this position is initially open through a 12-month contract.**
 What you’ll be doing
   

  

* Play an integral role in the configuration, testing, support, and success of People Technology at DoorDash/Wolt as we grow our existing businesses and enter new verticals, and additional countries
* Work to uncover underlying issues or business problems and turn those issues into solutions
* Identify, prioritize, and implement best practices from a solutions perspective based on gathered requirements
* Support system troubleshooting, configuration, testing, and deployment of assigned applications to meet requirements, timelines, and execution standards
* Support high-volume data loads via Enterprise Interface Builder (EIB) templates
* Provide global production analysis and support (break/fix analysis, reporting, business process administration, etc.)
* Work closely with cross-functional teams to ascertain and maintain the best possible configuration solution
* Rigorously document system requirements and configuration to build operational excellence
* Ensure data integrity by understanding and identifying opportunities to improve, working closely with cross-functional teams
* Train end-users and peers on new processes and functionality as needed


 Our humble expectations
   

  

* You have 1+ years of work experience in Workday maintenance/configuration, both domestic and international.
* You are passionate about system optimization and employee experience
* You are a strong business thinker, able to use ‘first principles’ to solve challenging business problems at their root level
* You are data-driven, able to analyze data with strong attention to detail and accuracy, and passionate about telling the story behind the data hence turning the data into configuration
* You are a self-motivated, rapid learner, excited about further developing your analytical and problem-solving skills
* You are results-oriented, always evaluating whether our team's activities are achieving the desired, measurable impact
* You are an owner, always looking for opportunities to learn and better your work product
* You are comfortable and thrive in a fast-paced, continually changing team-oriented environment and able to manage multiple deadlines simultaneously.
* You have a BA/BS degree in quantitative or business fields, or equivalent work experience
* You have an analytical mindset and a “People First” mentality with demonstrated ability to work through complex, ambiguous problems using data and creating configuration solutions based on that data
* You have strong written/verbal communication


**Next steps**
 If you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!
   

  

 We will be reviewing applications on an ongoing basis, so if this sounds like an opportunity you want to pursue, apply today!
   

  

 Please note that we do not accept applications coming in via email. Please submit your application in English via our job portal.
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Självgående Applikationsspecialist
description:
Är du en självgående applikationsspecialist som trivs med att ta eget ansvar? Vi söker en driven teknisk expert som kan förvalta kritiska system!
   

  

 Vad vi söker:
   

  

* Högre utbildning inom ett relevant tekniskt område, eller motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt
* 3 års erfarenhet av applikationsutveckling och förvaltning.
* Kompetens inom kodning och skriptning (Python och Powershell)
* Intresse för teknisk support, test, felsökning och kvalitetssäkring
* Förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya system och teknologier
* Kunskap om Databaser/Servrar
* Noggrannhet, kvalitetstänkande och vana vid att dokumentera arbetsprocesser.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt.
* Utmärkt kommunikationsförmåga på svenska och Engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt.


 Meriterande kunskaper:
   

  

* Förmåga att leda och koordinera tekniska utredningar
* Erfarenhet av webbaserade applikationer och tjänster
* Erfarenhet av andra programmeringsspråk som t.ex. C# eller .NET
* Erfarenhet av verktyg för dataanalys och statistik
* Insikt i principer för systemarkitektur och design


 Som konsult hos Liminity får du tillgång till marknadens bästa villkor och förmåner, inklusive:
   

  

* Spännande uppdrag hos en framåtsträvande kund
* Möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken
* Mentor-program för kontinuerlig utveckling
* Omfattande utbildningsmöjligheter och certifieringar
* Flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet till distansarbete
* Konkurrenskraftig lön och förmåner
* Och mycket mycket mer, läs mer på https://handbok.liminity.se


 Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär? Ansök idag och bli en del av Liminity - framtidens IT-konsultbolag!

title: Customer Experience Agent
description:
**Juni who? 👋**
 At Juni, we’re busy building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.
   

  

**How & Why We Do It 🚀**
 We give our people the same thing we’re building for our customers: freedom. Freedom to be 100% yourself. Freedom to explore your potential and what’s more – make the most of it. We truly believe we’re making the world a better place for online businesses, and we want you to be a part of that mission.
   

  

**Your role at a glance 🤸‍♀️**
 As a Customer Experience Agent at Juni, you will be part of our CX team dedicated to delivering exceptional experiences to our customers. You’ll be the first point of contact for inbound inquiries, resolving issues with empathy, clarity, and speed. Delivering valuable customer feedback internally to our wider org, and working closely within the CS function. You’ll help shape how our customers perceive Juni every day. Your work will directly contribute to building trust and driving customer loyalty as we scale.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities 👏**
 In this role, you’ll:
   

  

**Resolve Customer Inquiries**
* Manage all inbound support conversations via Intercom chat and support email.
* Triage and escalate urgent or high-risk issues, such as fraud or critical payment failures.


**Maintain Communication Standards**
* Deliver clear, consistent, and empathetic support in every interaction.
* Ensure all conversations are tagged with the correct types, subtypes, prior to closure.


**Drive Continuous Improvement**
* Surface recurring issues and feedback to Product/Engineering, Commercial, Leadership.
* Contribute to monthly reporting on CSAT trends, issue volumes, and SLA performance.


**Uphold SLAs and KPIs**
* First Response Time: Chat/Email varies depending on SLA (URGENT,HIGH,NORMAL,LOW)
* Resolution Time: Chat/Email varies depending on SLA (URGENT,HIGH,NORMAL,LOW)
* CSAT: >90% positive rating


**Weekend Coverage**
* Provide URGENT priority coverage during weekends and red days


**Tooling ⚙️**
* Intercom
* G-suite
* Slack
* Hubspot
* Notion


**Qualifications 👑**
***What we need to see***
* 1–3 years of experience in a customer support or CX role, ideally in fintech, SaaS, or fast-growing digital products.
* Proven track record of meeting SLAs and high CSAT scores.
* Excellent written and verbal Swedish and English communication.
* Comfort handling sensitive or high-risk scenarios (e.g., fraud, payment issues).


**What We’d Love To See**
* Experience working with Intercom.
* Familiarity with basic accounting or financial services concepts.
* Experience contributing to support process improvements or knowledge base content.


**Your people 👥**
 Our team is as ambitious as our amazing customers. We aim high and we move with speed to make our vision a reality. We care deeply about building a better future for our customers and each other. Here, you can work with people at the top of their game and who didn’t get there by playing games. You can help us create a whole new category in financial services.
   

  

**Your Benefits 😍**
 We’re freedom-first. Transparent. Caring. Empowering. So our benefits are too.
   

  

* We work hybrid. We'll see you in one of our offices in Stockholm or Gothenburg at least two days per week.
* Swap 2D for 3D. Meet all Junis IRL at the company onsite each year.
* Diversity is at our core. We're part Swedish. Part Canadian. Part French. Part Indian. Part Italian. Part British. Part Portuguese. You get the idea.
* Great players can stay great players. Progress your career whether you choose to manage people or not.
* Stock options. We can’t promise you’ll make a fortune. But we’ll give it our very best shot.
* Vacation days. 30 days. Awesome.
* Private Health insurance. You know. Just in case
* Beautiful offices in central Gothenburg and Stockholm, front row sea view!


 At Juni, we’re building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.

title: IT Security Expert
description:
At Vattenfall, we don’t just “do energy”, we exist to help our customers power their lives in ever climate smarter ways and free from fossil fuel within one generation. If you are looking for interesting challenges and the opportunity to be part of this change, then join our diverse and talented team and make a difference.
   

  

 For our offices in
 **Hamburg or Stockholm** 
 our
 **Business Area (BA) Markets** 
 is looking for the right person to fill the position as
 **IT Security Expert.**
**Your Key Responsibilities**
 Proactive Vulnerability Analysis:
   

  

* Conduct in-depth vulnerability assessments at the network level and beyond, encompassing vendors and external solutions.
* Collaborate with Business Information Officers (BIO) and Business Information Security Officers (BISO) to communicate situations and propose solutions to senior stakeholders.


**Evaluate Warning Reports**
* Assess and respond to vulnerability and warning reports from authoritative bodies such as BSI, CERT, and similar entities.


**Strengthen IT/OT Protection**
* Develop and champion the execution of plans to fortify IT/OT protection, emphasizing resilience and recovery capabilities.


**Incident Handling**
* Manage incidents and exceptions related to IT security effectively.


**Security Development Standards**
* Develop and educate on security-related development standards, seamlessly integrating them into the overall development process.


**Vendor Audits**
* Provide support for external vendor audits and participate in audits when necessary.


**Agile Team Support**
* Offer guidance on security solutions to Agile teams, providing consulting services on demand.


**Representational Role**
* Take on the role of BA Market BITSO, representing BA Market in the IT Security Forum at the Group level.


**Collaboration And Reporting**
* Work closely with BISOs and contribute to the Strategic Architecture team.
* Regularly report the overall security status in the BAM Security Steerco.


**Location**
 Hamburg, Stockholm, Katowice
   

  

**Company Description**
**Vattenfall** 
 is a European energy company with approximately 21 000 employees. For more than 100 years we have electrified industries, supplied energy to people’s homes and modernized our way of living through innovation and cooperation. We are looking for talented individuals who, in addition to their passion for their own role, also have strong team spirit and want to contribute to supporting a meaningful corporate mission.
   

  

**Business Area (BA) Markets’** 
 role in Vattenfall is to maximize the value of the overall portfolio by optimizing and dispatching, hedging, and sourcing for Vattenfall's sales and generation volumes. We serve as Vattenfall’s single access to energy commodity markets and trade electricity, emissions, fuels, freight, and renewable certificates. We employ around 500 professionals who are active across Europe with offices in Sweden, Germany, The Netherlands, and the United Kingdom.
   

  

 In BA Markets the mission of the
 **Unit OU Operations** 
 is to drive the digital transformation. OU Operations consists of diverse and highly skilled employees from more than 20 countries. We work internationally from our locations in Stockholm, Hamburg and Amsterdam.
   

  

 We have a culture of care and growth. You will collaborate with inspiring people around you, on complex and interesting topics. Together, we drive the energy transition.
   

  

**Qualifications**
**Your profile**
**Cybersecurity Expertise**
 We are seeking an individual with a solid understanding and, ideally, hands-on experience in addressing Cyber/Ransomware attacks and proficient recovery strategies. The ideal candidate should be well-versed in comprehending hacker methodologies, diverse attack vectors, and common cybersecurity vulnerabilities. An advantageous asset would be experience with the MS Defender tool suite.
   

  

**IT Architecture Proficiency**
 The candidate should possess a strong understanding of IT architecture, with expertise in network segmentation and structuring. A comprehensive understanding of ISO27001 and its controls is essential, along with a broader awareness of ITIL and effective life cycle management.
   

  

**Industry Knowledge**
 A holistic understanding of the Energy industry and familiarity with Energy Markets is advantageous.
   

  

**Communication Skills**
 Strong communication skills are vital for effectively explaining complex problems and proposing comprehensive solutions.
   

  

**Analytical Prowess**
 The ideal candidate should be adept at combining conceptual and big-picture analyses with meticulous attention to detail. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, along with a proactive approach to challenging the status quo, are crucial.
   

  

**Self-Starter And Team Collaboration**
 We are looking for an experienced individual who is a self-starter, capable of working independently and collaboratively within teams when appropriate.
   

  

 This profile is tailored for a seasoned professional who aims to contribute significantly to our cybersecurity objectives, leveraging a diverse skill set and industry-specific knowledge.
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

 We welcome your application in English, no later than
 **2025-09-07** 
 . We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website as we cannot guarantee that we will be able to process applications that are not made via our website.
   

  

 For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact our Recruiter Julia Norberg, julia.norberg@vattenfall.com.
   

  

 At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation.
   

  

 The security of Vattenfall and its employees is essential. For that reason, a pre-employment screening will be part of your recruitment process. The screening is based on the role you will fulfill within Vattenfall. The screening will be performed by a third party, called Validata. In addition, a certificate of good conduct (i.e. criminal record certificate) is required for certain positions.
   

  

 The trade union representatives in Sweden can be reached via Vattenfall´s switchboard +46 8 739 50 00. Sven-Gunnar Gremlin, Akademikerna and Anders Bohlin, Unionen.
   

  

 Since Vattenfall is a part of the Swedish critical infrastructure, many of our services are security classed. If this position is security classed the final candidates might be subjected to a security vetting process, according to the Swedish legislation.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**

title: Stockholms Parasportförbund söker Idrottskonsulent
description:
Stockholms Parasportförbund (Parasport Stockholm) är ett distriktsförbund inom Svenska Parasportförbundet. Vår huvudsakliga uppgift är att vara ett stöd till våra drygt 60 föreningar. Detta sker bland annat genom att skapa och upprätthålla kontaktytor för rekrytering, genomförande av rekryteringsaktiviteter samt tävlings och serie administration. Parasportförbundet administrerar idag 17 idrotter, men vi vill vara ett stöd för alla idrottsföreningar som erbjuder parasport. Detta är en del av idrottens inkluderingsmål vilket innebär att Svenska Parasportförbundet lämnar över idrotter till respektive specialförbund, exempelvis har bordtennis nyligen lämnas över till Svenska Bordtennisförbundet.
   

  

 Att arbeta som idrottskonsulent hos Parasport Stockholm är ett omväxlande arbete där du får arbeta med allt från kontaktnätsbyggande, föreningsutveckling, och tävlingsadministration till att vara instruktör i vår simskola samt prova på verksamhet.
   

  

 Arbetet sker på de tider uppgiften kräver, vilket gör att du behöver vara flexibel och kan arbeta både kvällar och helger när det behövs.
   

  

 Arbetsbeskrivning: Arbeta med att coacha personer med funktionsnedsättning att hitta rätt idrott . Arbeta med nätverk för rekrytering. Arbeta i förbundets simskola. Arbeta med föreningsutveckling och utveckling av parasporten i stort. Arbeta med utveckling och administration av förbundets tävlingsverksamhet. Arbeta med att organisera och genomföra aktiviteter, utbildningar, föräldramöten m.m.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer och personliga egenskaper - Utbildning/erfarenhet av projektledning -
   

  

 Utbildning/erfarenhet av pedagogiskt ledarskap - Kunskap inom svensk idrotts organisation, parasport och föreningsarbete - Kunskap om föreningsutveckling/verksamhetsutveckling - Kunna strukturera, planera, organisera och prioritera aktiviteter på ett effektivt sätt - Har ett bra tempo i sig och van att ta egna initiativ - Sätter upp och håller tidsramar - Kunna bemöta människor i olika åldrar med eller utan funktionsnedsättning - Kunskap om funktionsnedsättningar - Kunna arbeta oregelbundna arbetstider Meriterande
   

  

 Egen funktionsnedsättning eller erfarenhet av olika funktionsnedsättningar är meriterande. Utbildning Vi ser helst att du har en utbildning som Idrottskonsulent, Fritidspedagog eller motsvarande. B-körkort och möjlighet att använda egen bil i tjänsten är ett krav. Språkkunskaper Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift. Meriterande att kunna språk inom de övriga språkgrupper som finns i Sverige. IT-kunskaper God förmåga att hantera IdrottOnline och Office-paketet. Alternativt god IT-vana och förutsättningar att lära sig nya program.
